text:
🗞️@Novartis will assist in the @pfizer-@BioNTech_Group #Covid19 #vaccine production effort, signing an initial contract manufacturing agreement. The deal will have #Novartis use its #aseptic manufacturing facilities at its Stein, Switzerland site.
➡️https://t.co/ec6cl7IrKh https://t.co/wFWFyub0dt
